CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Weight__c, "Small Letter" ), "Small Letter; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Weight__c, "Large< 500" ), "Large< 500; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Weight__c, "Large >500" ), "Large >500; ",null )
CustomField.label: Weight for Print Post
